scripts.startBscTestnet: sudo truffle migrate --network bscTestnet --all --reset && truffle run verify DSOPPresale --network bscTestnet
scripts.startBscMainnet: truffle migrate --network bscMainnet --reset && truffle run verify DSOPPresale --network bscMainnet
scripts.startRinkeby: sudo truffle migrate --network rinkeby --reset && truffle run verify DSOPPresale --network rinkeby
scripts.startRopsten: sudo truffle migrate --network ropsten --reset && truffle run verify DSOPPresale --network ropsten
scripts.startEthMainnet: truffle migrate --network mainnet --reset && truffle run verify DSOPPresale --network mainnet
scripts.startInnovate: truffle migrate --network %(grep DEPLOY_NETWORK .env)% --reset && truffle run verify DSOPPresale --network $(grep DEPLOY_NETWORK .env)
